title: Looking for anime recommendations.
body:
So, I've been down in the dumps lately, and anime kind of helps me feel better (I don't know why, it just does). I like happy, silly romance animes, or slice of lifes that have some kind of plot to it all. I don't like a lot of fanservice, and I can't stand gore or over the top violence, and any kind of existential talk will get my anxiety going (so no Your Lie in April or Clannad :P).

I liked Toradora, Chuunibyu, Acchi Kocchi, K-On!, Working!, Chobits, DearS, No Game No Life, Kono Suba, Sakurasou no Pet na Kanojo, Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid, Jitsu wa Watashi wa, Squid Girl, Eromanga Sensei, and so on.

My computer went bad lately, so I had to get a new one (everything was fried in a surge), and I lost my list of animes I had. : / So I need to remake it. Any recommendations help, so long as they fit my few criteria.

Thanks. ^^
